code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{fetchClimateChanges}from'../services/api.js';import"../styles/ClimateChangeList.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ClimateChangeList=()=>{const[climateChanges,setClimateChanges]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{const getClimateChanges=async()=>{const result=await fetchClimateChanges();setClimateChanges(result.data);};getClimateChanges();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"climate-change-list",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Climate Changes and Disasters in Indonesia"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:climateChanges.map(climateChange=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:`/climate-change/${climateChange._id}`,children:climateChange.name})},climateChange._id))})})]});};export default ClimateChangeList;
